CHAT.comment: at the start of the recording June and her mother are sitting in the center of the floor. mother holds out a book , it is the story of cinderella.

u.a: June sits on her mother's knee and looks at the book .
the drawing of one of the stepsisters is shaped like a bottle
June keeps turning the pages and her mother comments on them .
mother points to the bead necklaces of the stepsisters
June drops the book and her mother pick's up a Tom and Jerry book .
gets another book , June is looking at a picture in a book of animals .
points to a picture of some cows
June climbs onto a chair to investigate the taperecorder .
silence during which June climbs down from the chair and goes to investigate the microphone .
gets the toy ladybug out of the toybox
June gets a toy train out of the toybox .
June holds up both the bug and the train .
silence during which June pushes both toys across the floor .
tosses the train into the toybox
tosses the bug into the toybox
June gets both toys out of the toybox and sings to herself , silence .
holds the bug up to her mother
June holds up the bug again
mother taps the train in June's other hand
June dumps the bug on the floor .
mother touches the train again , June dumps the train , mother picks it up .
June ignores her mother and goes over and plays with the microphone , her mother is still holding the train .
June takes the string of the train and then looks for the bug again , but has a problem finding it .
silence during which June pulls the toys along the floor .
gives a book to her mother
June is looking around for something .
June picks a book out of the toybox
June gives the book to mother .
June gives another book to her mother .
June drops the books that she is holding
June slips as she climbs on to her mother's knee
June sits on her mother's knee , mother shows her a picture in the book
June gets off her mother's knee and goes to get the Tom and Jerry book .
June dumps the book back into the box .
June puts another book back in the box
June puts another book into the box
June tips the shapes out of the shapesorter .
June picks up a shape and puts it back into the shapesorter through the open lid , then she closes the lid and takes it to her mother .
June attempts to put in a shape but gives up and hands the shape to her mother .
June gives her mother a shape .
rotates the shapesorter looking for the correct hole
June putting shapes through holes with mother's assistance .
June picks up a large cube and puts it on top of the shapesorter .
June stacks a second cube on top of the first .
June turns the shapesorter looking for the correct hole for a shape .
June locates the correct hole . Maybe by chance ? ? ? .
mother pushes in a shape that was stuck in a hole . June carries the shapesorter around the room .
mother hands a shape to June
June has a shape already , so she ignores her mother's offering .
June attempts to put the shape through a hole without success .
referencing the shape June already has .
mother pokes her finger through a hole but June hands the shape to her mother .
June takes the shape back again .
June puts the shape through the correct hole
June puts the shape through the hole indicated by her mother
mother picks up and rotates the shapesorter mother hands her another shape but June can't get it through the hole .
June attempts to put the shape through three different holes without any success and then makes a frustrated noise again .
mother rotates the shapesorter and then gives her a second shape which will fit through one of the holes .
June hands the shape back to her mother .
mother orients the shape on the hole
mother pokes her finger through the correct hole .
June returns to the original problematic shape and tries again without any further success , she cries again .
June attempts it again and hands mother a new shape for help .
mother rotates the box to find the right hole .
points to the correct hole points
June attempts a different shape than the one she was offered and fails to locate it correctly , she makes a frustrated cry again .
June picks up another shape , attempts it unsuccessfully , becomes frustrated and tosses the shape away .
June picks up another shape , tries it and then becomes frustrated when it won't go through the hole .
June tries the wrong hole and cries again .
June reaches for another shapes and tries it , but she has problems with the new shape and cries again .
mother rotates the box and June tries to put the shape through a hole before her mother has indicated which is the correct one .
points to a shape and a hole
June cries without even picking up a shape .
June tries but at the wrong spot , she cries and tosses the shape away . mother shows her how .
June picks up another shape and mother rotates the shapesorter . silence .
mother rotates the shapesorter and places the shape by the right hole .
June fails , becomes frustrated , tosses the shape away and cries .
the shape is stuck in the hole .
June looks up and sees the toy ladybug
June hands the bug to her mother .
could be a comment that it pulls like bug
June gets the bug back from here mother
June puts the bug on top of the shapesorter .
June puts the train beside the bug and picks up the bug again .
June removes both toys one by one from the shapesorter .
June looks at bug and hands it to her mother .
mother collects the shapes into a heap
silence June tips the shapes out , falls over and laughs , then she picks out the last few shapes by hand .
they both look in the toybox
mother gets out a wooden car
June wanders around with the car in her hand .
dumps the car into her mother's lap
June lifts three books out of the toybox and sits with them .
June picks up another book , she is now holding four
June puts some of the books down .
June picks up all the books again , mother hands her the snow white book .
mother gets a ball and puts it by June's feet
silence during which June puts down all the books , picks them up one by one and then puts them down again .
June rotates the ball as if she is examining it .
June starts to move the shapes from the floor
June begins to put the shapes into the open shapesorter
June goes to the toybox and digs in it .
June is holding the ball and looking around .
June starts to drag her little chair into the center of the floor
June begins to play with the microphone .
June wanders off into the corner
removes the books from the floor , picks up the ball and rolls it to June .
mother hands the ball to June
June throws the ball in the wrong direction
mother sings , June picks up the wolf and rotates and falls at the correct moment .
no response , June keeps on twirling until she becomes dizzy and falls .
June twirls again and falls again .
mother retrieves the ball , June takes it from her mother .
June throws the ball in the wrong direction .
June retrieves the ball and throws it to her mother .
